member.name: T:umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationBase
member.summary: ApplicationBase provides an easy to use base class to install event handlers in umbraco. Class inhiriting from ApplcationBase are automaticly registered and instantiated by umbraco on application start. To use, inhirite the ApplicationBase Class and add an empty constructor.

member.name: P:umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationBase.Alias
member.summary: Gets the application alias. By Default it returns the full name of the application class. The Alias must be unique.

member.name: P:umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationBase.Name
member.summary: Gets the application name. By default it returns the application Classname

member.name: P:umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationBase.Icon
member.summary: Gets the application icon. For use with application installation which is currently not implemented. The icon is a path to an image file in the /umbraco/images/tray folder
member.value: The path to the application icon.

member.name: P:umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationBase.SortOrder
member.summary: Gets the application sortorder. For use with application installation which is currently not implemented. Sets the sortorder for the Icon in the section tray. By default it returns the value 0

member.name: P:umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationBase.Visible
member.summary: Gets the application visibility. For use with application installation which is currently not implemented. Determines if the application is installed as a visible section in umbraco or just a service running.

member.name: P:umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationBase.InitTreeAlias
member.summary: The alias of a application tree to be initialized when section is opened in the backend. Should only be set if a applcation tree needs to loaded right away.

member.name: P:umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationBase.ApplicationTrees
member.summary: Collection of application trees. For use with application installation which is currently not implemented. Contains the collection of application trees to be installed along with the application itself. Return null by default.

member.name: T:umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationTree
member.summary: umbraco.BusinessLogic.ApplicationTree provides access to the application tree structure in umbraco. An application tree is a collection of nodes belonging to one or more application(s). Through this class new application trees can be created, modified and deleted.

member.summary: A static constructor that will cache all application trees

member.name: T:umbraco.BasePages.BasePage
member.summary: umbraco.BasePages.BasePage is the default page type for the umbraco backend. The basepage keeps track of the current user and the page context. But does not Restrict access to the page itself. The keep the page secure, the umbracoEnsuredPage class should be used instead

member.summary: Forces umbraco to be medium trust compatible

member.name: T:umbraco.StartsWithContainer
member.summary: Structure that checks in logarithmic time if a given string starts with one of the added keys.

member.name: F:umbraco.StartsWithContainer._list
member.summary: Internal sorted list of keys.

member.name: M:umbraco.StartsWithContainer.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified new key.

member.name: M:umbraco.StartsWithContainer.StartsWith(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string starts with any of the added keys.
member.returns: true if a key is found that matches the start of target
member.remarks: Runs in O(s*log(n)), with n the number of keys and s the length of target.

member.name: T:umbraco.StartsWithContainer.StartsWithComparator
member.summary: Comparator that tests if a string starts with another.
member.remarks: Not a real comparator, since it is not reflexive. (x==y does not imply y==x)

member.name: F:umbraco.StartsWithContainer.StartsWithComparator._stringComparer
member.summary: Default string comparer.

member.name: F:umbraco.StartsWithContainer.StartsWithComparator.Instance
member.summary: Gets an instance of the StartsWithComparator.

member.name: M:umbraco.StartsWithContainer.StartsWithComparator.Compare(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tests if whole begins with all characters of part.
member.returns: Returns 0 if whole starts with part, otherwise performs standard string comparison.

member.name: T:umbraco.UmbracoSettings
member.summary: The UmbracoSettings Class contains general settings information for the entire Umbraco instance based on information from the /config/umbracoSettings.config file

member.name: M:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.GetKeyAsNode(System.String)
member.summary: Selects a xml node in the umbraco settings config file.
member.param: The xpath query to the specific node.
member.returns: If found, it returns the specific configuration xml node.

member.name: M:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.GetKey(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of configuration xml node with the specified key.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings._umbracoSettings
member.summary: Gets the umbraco settings document.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.UploadAllowDirectories
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the media library will create new directories in the /media directory.
member.value: true if new directories are allowed otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.EnableLogging
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether logging is enabled in umbracoSettings.config (/settings/logging/enableLogging).
member.value: true if logging is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.EnableAsyncLogging
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether logging happens async.
member.value: true if async logging is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.DisabledLogTypes
member.summary: Gets the disabled log types.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.PackageServer
member.summary: Gets the package server url.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.UseDomainPrefixes
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether umbraco will use domain prefixes.
member.value: true if umbraco will use domain prefixes; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.UseAspNetMasterPages
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether umbraco will use ASP.NET MasterPages for rendering instead of its propriatary templating system.
member.value: true if umbraco will use ASP.NET MasterPages; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.CloneXmlCacheOnPublish
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether umbraco will clone XML cache on publish.
member.value: true if umbraco will clone XML cache on publish; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.TidyEditorContent
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether rich text editor content should be parsed by tidy.
member.value: true if content is parsed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.TidyCharEncoding
member.summary: Gets the encoding type for the tidyied content.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.PropertyContextHelpOption
member.summary: Gets the property context help option, this can either be 'text', 'icon' or 'none'

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.ImageFileTypes
member.summary: Gets the allowed image file types.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.ScriptFileTypes
member.summary: Gets the allowed script file types.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.ScriptFolderPath
member.summary: Gets the path to the scripts folder used by the script editor.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.ScriptDisableEditor
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the rich-text script editor should be disabled for editing templates, css, xslt and scripts The current editor is based on Codepress (codepress.org) which is not compatible with internet explorer The editor is therefor turned off by default and a standard Textarea is used instead
member.value: true if the scripteditor is disabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.GraphicHeadlineFormat
member.summary: Gets the graphic headline format - png or gif

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.EnsureUniqueNaming
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether umbraco will ensure unique node naming. This will ensure that nodes cannot have the same url, but will add extra characters to a url. ex: existingnodename.aspx would become existingnodename(1).aspx if a node with the same name is found
member.value: true if umbraco ensures unique node naming; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.NotificationEmailSender
member.summary: Gets the notification email sender.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.NotificationDisableHtmlEmail
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether notification-emails are HTML.
member.value: true if html notification-emails are disabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.ImageAllowedAttributes
member.summary: Gets the allowed attributes on images.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.ScheduledTasks
member.summary: Gets the scheduled tasks as XML

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.UrlReplaceCharacters
member.summary: Gets a list of characters that will be replaced when generating urls

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.UseDistributedCalls
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether umbraco will use distributed calls. This enables umbraco to share cache and content across multiple servers. Used for load-balancing high-traffic sites.
member.value: true if umbraco uses distributed calls; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.DistributedCallUser
member.summary: Gets the ID of the user with access rights to perform the distributed calls.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.DistributionServers
member.summary: Gets IP or hostnames of the distribution servers. These servers will receive a call everytime content is created/deleted/removed and update their content cache accordingly, ensuring a consistent cache on all servers

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.Repositories
member.summary: Gets all repositories registered, and returns them as XmlNodes, containing name, alias and webservice url. These repositories are used by the build-in package installer and uninstaller to install new packages and check for updates. All repositories should have a unique alias. All packages installed from a repository gets the repository alias included in the install information

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.UseViewstateMoverModule
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether umbraco will use the viewstate mover module. The viewstate mover will move all asp.net viewstate information to the bottom of the aspx page to ensure that search engines will index text instead of javascript viewstate information.
member.value: true if umbraco will use the viewstate mover module; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.isXmlContentCacheDisabled
member.summary: Tells us whether the Xml Content cache is disabled or not Default is enabled

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.continouslyUpdateXmlDiskCache
member.summary: Tells us whether the Xml to always update disk cache, when changes are made to content Default is enabled

member.name: P:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.EnableSplashWhileLoading
member.summary: Tells us whether to use a splash page while umbraco is initializing content. If not, requests are queued while umbraco loads content. For very large sites (+10k nodes) it might be usefull to have a splash page Default is disabled

member.name: T:umbraco.UmbracoSettings.Webservices

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is enabled.

member.summary: Gets the document service users who have access to use the document web service

member.summary: Gets the file service users who have access to use the file web service

member.summary: Gets the folders used by the file web service

member.summary: Gets the member service users who have access to use the member web service

member.summary: Gets the stylesheet service users who have access to use the stylesheet web service

member.summary: Gets the media service users who have access to use the media web service

member.summary: Gets the maintenance service users who have access to use the maintance web service

member.summary: Generic Serialization method that will serialize object without the default namespaces: http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance This also ensures that the returned XML is always encoded in UTF-8.
